B

b - Variable in class mainForm
 
BubbleCompare() - Method in class mainForm
This method is used for statistically comparing Array size against sorting time, it creates an array of bubbleSort objects, an array of threads to run each sorting algorithm and an ArrayList to hold the data.
bubbleS - Variable in class drawPanel
 
bubbleSort - Class in <Unnamed>
The bubbleSort class is is used to implement a Bubble Sorting process on an Array of random integers that are automatically generated by the algorithm, the class can be used to either animate the bubble sort process or record the time taken to fully sort a single array.
bubbleSort(int, drawPanel, boolean, ArrayList<arrayStore>) - Constructor for class bubbleSort
Constructor for bubbleSort
BubbleSort() - Method in class bubbleSort
BubbleSort method, steps through every item in the array and compares each adjacent item and swaps the values if the two items are in descending order, after one cycle of the first for loop the largest integer in the array will be at the end position, the process is then repeated over looking the items that have already been moved to the end of the array as they are considered sorted
BubbleSort() - Method in class mainForm
This method creates a bubbleSort with 275 values in its array for animation purposes, the drawPanel class is passed in but no Array List as the data is not required for analysis.
bubbleStore - Variable in class mainForm
